item.description:
Monday evening French(mostly) film called
"A Secret" NOT to be confused with THE SECRET!
Joint Meetup with the West Hartford German Meetup- a chance to meet others with an interest in languages
This French film covers Holocaust themes and is in French, German and Yiddish

We will meet in the Real Art Ways lobby shortly before 7:00. If you don't know Real Art Ways, you must! It is a wonderful Hartford treasure.
For those who wish to socialize/discuss afterwards, there is the Wood 'n Tap restaurant around the corner.


"...artfully and gently gestures towards such enormous themes without spelling them out." A.O. Scott, New York Times review.

Francois, a solitary child, invents for himself a brother and a family history. But then he learns a family secret, concerning the way in which his family survived Nazi-occupied France.

(2007, France) 105 min
French/Yiddish/German with subtitles
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby or ask at the counter

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French film trip
